Room.Name: Riverdell Center for Tracking Training
Room.ShortDescription: Welcome Rangers to the Riverdell Center for Tracking and Training.
Room.LongDescription: The large complex to the east provides you with the best training facilities for rangers through the fifteenth level and beyond. Only Rangers may enter the park to work on their skills. All training locations are well hidden, so you must use your tracking and searching skills to find them. Once you have entered the park, you must find one of the training locations before you can leave.
